metadata.description: Foundation Words Part 4 - Enhanced with Engagement Features
metadata.pedagogical_focus: Foods, objects, and sensory words with full engagement support
metadata.builds_on: Chunks 1-3 foundation patterns, adding concrete nouns

words.meaning_support: A white drink that comes from cows and helps you grow strong
words.context_introduction: A creamy white drink that makes your bones and teeth strong. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya poured cool MILK into her glass after their long day of exploring!
words.visual_context: ü•õ White drink that makes you strong
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like milk by itself or mixed with something like cereal?
words.story_connection: Farm adventure characters learn how MILK comes from happy cows!
words.celebration_message: Great job! MILK ends with the 'lk' blend - your tongue touches the roof of your mouth!

words.meaning_support: A sweet, fluffy food we eat at birthdays and celebrations
words.context_introduction: A sweet, fluffy treat with frosting that makes celebrations special. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam helped Maya bake a delicious chocolate CAKE for their friend's birthday!
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite kind of cake or celebration treat?
words.story_connection: Characters make special CAKE for friends' birthdays in heartwarming stories!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! CAKE has magic 'e' that makes the 'a' say its name!

words.meaning_support: A soft food made from flour that we use for sandwiches
words.context_introduction: A soft, warm food made from flour that smells amazing when it bakes. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The explorers shared thick slices of homemade BREAD with berry jam!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like the smell of bread baking? What's your favorite kind?
words.story_connection: Characters often share BREAD around campfires during their adventures!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! BREAD has 'br' blend and 'ea' vowel team making the short 'e' sound!

words.meaning_support: A round red or green fruit that grows on trees and is crunchy
words.context_introduction: A crunchy, sweet fruit that grows on trees and comes in red, green, or yellow. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya climbed the tree to pick a perfect red APPLE for their picnic lunch!
words.visual_context: üçé Crunchy fruit that grows on trees
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like apples better red, green, or yellow? Raw or cooked?
words.story_connection: APPLE trees often hold secrets and treasures in magical stories!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! APPLE has the 'le' pattern at the end - two letters making one sound!

words.meaning_support: A round orange fruit that is sweet, juicy, and full of vitamin C
words.context_introduction: A round, bright-colored fruit that's both the name of a fruit and a color. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam peeled the juicy ORANGE and shared the sweet segments with everyone!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like oranges better as fruit or as juice?
words.story_connection: Tropical adventure characters discover amazing ORANGE groves!
words.celebration_message: Great! ORANGE has two syllables: 'or-ange' - you can clap the beats!

words.meaning_support: A round toy that bounces and rolls, perfect for games
words.context_introduction: A perfectly round toy that bounces, rolls, and is perfect for playing games. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya threw the red BALL high in the air and Sam caught it perfectly!
words.visual_context: ‚öΩ Round toy that bounces and rolls
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite game to play with a ball?
words.story_connection: A magic BALL often leads characters on unexpected adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! BALL has double 'l' letters making one strong sound!

words.meaning_support: Something fun to play that has rules and makes you think
words.context_introduction: A fun activity with rules that friends can play together. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The friends invented a new GAME using sticks, stones, and their imagination!
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite game to play with friends?
words.story_connection: Characters often solve problems by turning them into a fun GAME!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! GAME has magic 'e' that makes the 'a' say its name!

words.meaning_support: Something children play with for fun and imagination
words.context_introduction: Something special that children play with to have fun and use their imagination. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya's favorite TOY was a wooden horse that went on all her pretend adventures!
words.personal_connection_question: What was your favorite toy when you were younger?
words.story_connection: Magic TOY characters often come to life in wonderful stories!
words.celebration_message: Great job! TOY has the 'oy' diphthong - two vowels blending together!

words.meaning_support: A container with four sides and a lid for storing things
words.context_introduction: A container with four sides where you can store special treasures and secrets. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam opened the mysterious wooden BOX and gasped at the treasures inside!
words.personal_connection_question: What would you keep in a special treasure box?
words.story_connection: Treasure BOX discoveries often start the best adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! BOX follows the consonant-vowel-consonant pattern!

words.meaning_support: What you open to go into a room or building
words.context_introduction: What you open and close to go into rooms and buildings. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya slowly opened the creaky DOOR and discovered a room full of ancient books!
words.visual_context: üö™ What you open to enter rooms
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like doors that are fancy and decorated or simple and plain?
words.story_connection: Secret DOOR discoveries lead to the most amazing hidden places!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! DOOR has the 'oor' vowel team making that long 'o' sound!

words.meaning_support: A space inside a house or building with walls around it
words.context_introduction: A space inside buildings with walls, where people do different activities. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Each ROOM in the old mansion held a different magical surprise!
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite room in your house and why?
words.story_connection: Secret ROOM discoveries reveal hidden treasures and mysteries!
words.celebration_message: Great! ROOM has the 'oom' vowel team - same sound family as DOOR!

words.meaning_support: A soft, comfortable place where you sleep at night
words.context_introduction: A soft, cozy place where you rest your body and have dreams. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: After their long adventure, Maya fell asleep in her comfortable BED dreaming of tomorrow's fun!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you have a favorite blanket or stuffed animal for bedtime?
words.story_connection: Cozy BED scenes often end the best adventure stories!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! BED is a classic consonant-vowel-consonant word!

words.meaning_support: When the sun is shining and it's light outside
words.context_introduction: When the sun is up, the sky is bright, and it's time for adventures. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Every DAY brought Maya and Sam new discoveries to explore together!
words.visual_context: ‚òÄÔ∏è When sun is up and it's bright
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite part of the day for adventures?
words.story_connection: Each new DAY starts fresh adventures for story characters!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! DAY has the 'ay' vowel team making the long 'a' sound!

words.meaning_support: When it's dark and the moon and stars come out
words.context_introduction: When the sky turns dark, stars twinkle, and it's time for sleep. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: On clear NIGHT adventures, Maya loved counting shooting stars with Sam!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like looking at stars and the moon at night?
words.story_connection: Magical things often happen during NIGHT adventures in stories!
words.celebration_message: Great job! NIGHT has silent letters 'gh' - you can't hear them but they're there!

words.meaning_support: Brightness that helps us see things clearly
words.context_introduction: Brightness from the sun, moon, or lamps that helps you see clearly. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The warm LIGHT from their campfire made shadows dance on the trees!
words.personal_connection_question: What kinds of light make you feel happy and safe?
words.story_connection: Characters follow mysterious LIGHT to discover amazing places!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! LIGHT has those same silent 'gh' letters as NIGHT!

words.meaning_support: When there is no light and you can't see things well
words.context_introduction: When there's no light and everything is shadowy and mysterious. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Even in the DARK forest, Maya felt brave because Sam was right beside her!
words.personal_connection_question: Are you someone who likes cozy darkness or bright light better?
words.story_connection: Brave characters explore DARK places and discover hidden wonders!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! DARK has 'ar' where the 'r' controls the vowel sound!

words.meaning_support: Very warm, like fire, summer sun, or fresh soup
words.context_introduction: Very warm feeling, like summer sunshine or a cozy fire. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The HOT chocolate warmed Maya and Sam after their snowy adventure!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like hot weather for playing outside or cool weather better?
words.story_connection: Characters enjoy HOT meals around campfires during adventures!
words.celebration_message: Great! HOT is a perfect consonant-vowel-consonant word!

words.meaning_support: Very cool, like ice, snow, or a winter morning
words.context_introduction: Very cool feeling, like ice cubes, snow, or a winter breeze. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The COLD mountain stream felt refreshing on their hot hiking day!
words.personal_connection_question: What do you like to do when it's cold outside?
words.story_connection: Characters bundle up warm during COLD weather adventures!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! COLD ends with the 'ld' blend - letters working together!

words.meaning_support: White flakes that fall from the sky in winter and cover everything
words.context_introduction: Soft white flakes that fall from winter clouds and make everything look magical. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya and Sam built a funny snowman when the first SNOW of winter arrived!
words.visual_context: ‚ùÑÔ∏è White flakes that fall in winter
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite thing to do when it snows?
words.story_connection: SNOW creates magical winter wonderlands in adventure stories!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! SNOW starts with 'sn' blend and has 'ow' vowel team!

words.meaning_support: Water drops that fall from clouds to help plants grow
words.context_introduction: Water drops that fall from gray clouds and make puddles for splashing. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: After the gentle RAIN stopped, Maya and Sam found the most beautiful rainbow!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like playing in the rain or watching it from inside?
words.story_connection: After RAIN storms, characters often discover magical rainbows and treasures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! RAIN has the 'ai' vowel team making the long 'a' sound!
